typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as short,
		name as string,
		sal as short,
		dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> employee1
source(output(
		deptid as string,
		deptname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> dept
dept, employee1 lookup(deptid == dept,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
